articles.content: Indian startup Jeh Aerospace inaugurated its new aerospace and defence manufacturing facility in Hyderabad on Tuesday. The new facility is estimated to be extended up to 1,60,000 sq ft and will provi… [+2492 chars]

articles.title: Reliance shares may rally over 20%, say analysts - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Reliance Industries Q3 results: Morgan Stanley has an overweight call on the stock and has raised its target price to ₹3,046, implying it expects the stock to jump 12% from the January 20 closing price. In its note, the brokerage said it thinks it is RIL’s ti…

articles.title: Suzlon sees Mutual Funds cut their stake in the December quarter, Bank of Baroda also exits - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Bandhan Core Equity Fund, whose name featured in the September shareholding pattern with a 1.23% stake, does not feature in the latest pattern.
